text:
We are using your parser to convert xml to html in Java. However, when the xml 
content contains HKSCS (Hong Kong Supplimentary Character Set) characters, 
these characters will be transformed to a question mark (?) after the 
transformation. Do you have any idea on transform HKSCS xml file to html?

Thank You for your attention
creator: kytony@netvigator.com
bodewig@apache.org
text: Are you sure you didn't mean to report this as a bug against Xalan?
